Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $15000. I am offering this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $18000. This investment has the potential to pay dividends in terms of efficiency gains and cost savings. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
